column1: mathcreemers,Math,Creemers,Lead RF Technologist at Signify,https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/C4E03AQGhWaK-SUJDAQ/profile-displayphoto-shrink_800_800/0/1516319996205?e=1697673600&v=beta&t=AIjmJmM21QewSkjbVX-225EZIN1AZpgO6CjMaEifOq0,https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/D5616AQEmJo1A79peFA/profile-displaybackgroundimage-shrink_350_1400/0/1680174340084?e=1697673600&v=beta&t=yayBs7J9hxEfxsnLhaOHrrznlZhgiEhdXp9clO5hMDg,personal,ACoAAACl8H8ByvykEriFclWq2dGL7KoQWXQxdwU,10875007,,"As master in Electrical Engineering I have 25 years of experience in RF and analogue electronics for wireless and optical semiconductors, medical imaging scanners and data networking.
I like to look beyond boarders and am eager to work on technically challenging products, system wide and preferably multi-disciplinary. My ambition is to continuously improve and grow.

column2: Planned and executed the testing and integration of SoC products for full mass production. Automated the validation process, including design of built-in-testing.
Designed Bluetooth System in Package products.
System design for the Bluetooth receiver chain in Mathworks Simulink
Developed a demonstrator system for a 40Gbps optical link.
Wrote application notes and trained customers.
Designed MRI heart, head, knee and abdominal receive coils, that are still in production.
Was granted MRI patents and presented papers at conferences.

'description': ""•	Validation lead for RF and analogue mixed signal functions in connectivity Systems on Chip (SoC).  These SoC's contain multiple functions like FM receiver and transmitter, Bluetooth, GPS receiver, NFC and embedded ARM microcontrollers for calibrations, self-test and control.
•	Verifying compliance with datasheet and internal specifications.  
•	Issue and investigate bug reports and final release for mass production. 
•	Plan the SoC validation and take care of execution in dedicated project teams. 
•	Definition and design of automated test environments, built in test methods and test scripting."", 'title': 'Validation lead Wireless System on Chip', 'employment_type': None}]}, {'company': {'id': 1088, 'name': 'NXP semiconductors', 'logo': 'https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/C510BAQFopDEhRcpz9g/company-logo_400_400/0/1519855915315?e=1700697600&v=beta&t=-zPjMD2Hs2AtI3vtvQgv9NaE_uNvi4UlCq_LataCqvo', 'url': 'https://www.linkedin.com/company/nxp-semiconductors/', 'employees': {'start': 10001, 'end': None}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': None, 'day': None, 'year': 2001}, 'end': {'month': None, 'day': None, 'year': 2008}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': 'Nijmegen', 'date': {'start': {'month': None, 'day': None, 'year': 2004}, 'end': {'month': None, 'day': None, 'year': 2008}}, 'company': 'NXP Semiconductors', 'description': '•	Design, validation and qualification of Bluetooth modules. They were all mass produced. 
•	Made behavioural models for all blocks from antenna, LNA, 2.4GHz mixer, 300MHz sigma delta ADC, digital filtering, correlation, timing recovery, carrier offset and drift compensation and Viterbi demodulator, including dimensioning for all blocks.', 'title': 'Wireless System in Package designer', 'employment_type': None}, {'location': None, 'date': {'start': {'month': None, 'day': None, 'year': 2001}, 'end': {'month': None, 'day': None, 'year': 2004}}, 'company': 'NXP Semiconductors', 'description': '•	Supported customers in designing-in their optical infrastructure systems. 
•	Wrote application notes and presentations.
•	Application optimising of laser drivers, optical receivers, high speed multiplexers and switches.
•	Feedback customer experience to IC design in order to enhance performance.
•	In absence of the team leader it took over his role as leader for the team of 3-4 application engineers.', 'title': 'Optical Networking Applications and Design Engineer', 'employment_type': None}]}, {'company': {'id': 1090, 'name': 'Philips Medical Systems', 'logo': 'https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/C510BAQG4O5wCG6zf2Q/company-logo_400_400/0/1519855869410?e=1700697600&v=beta&t=nckPFFIatOW5k72Vbjusy3ph4jMtjVRp2GpRIrfF8Es', 'url': 'https://www.linkedin.com/company/philips/', 'employees': {'start': 10001, 'end': None}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': None, 'day': None, 'year': 1992}, 'end': {'month': None, 'day': None, 'year': 2001}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': None, 'date': {'start': {'month': None, 'day': None, 'year': 1992}, 'end': {'month': None, 'day': None, 'year': 2001}}, 'company': 'Philips', 'description': '•	I designed several RF chain components for the MRI scanner and body coil. 
•	Designed dedicated receiver coils with integrated low noise amplifiers and active decoupling. The whole engineering cycle from customer requirement to full production was spanned. 
•	Developed coils for research purposes in close cooperation with the system reconstruction team to optimize image quality.', 'title': 'Senior RF Engineer Magnetic Resonance Imaging', 'employment_type': None}]}, {'company': {'id': None, 'name': 'W&G Special Products', 'logo': None, 'url': None, 'employees': {'start': None, 'end': None}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': None, 'day': None, 'year': 1988}, 'end': {'month': None, 'day': None, 'year': 1992}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': None, 'date': {'start': {'month': None, 'day': None, 'year': 1988}, 'end': {'month': None, 'day': None, 'year': 1992}}, 'company': 'W&G Special Products', 'description': '•	I developed Local Area Network components for proprietary networks. These were sold through large companies like UNISYS, BULL, WANG, Philips and IBM at the time.
•	Educated the service engineers on how to install and plan such networks. 
•	I did the same introduction of technology and education of service engineers for optical networks that emerged.
•	UNIX IT system manager for the company.', 'title': 'Research and Development Engineer', 'employment_type': None}]}]",[],"['Physics', 'Simulations', 'Bluetooth', 'Analogue', 'Semiconductors', 'RF and Analogue test strategies', 'Test Planning', 'System Integration Testing', 'Integration Planning', 'Electronics Validation', 'Root Cause Analysis', 'Behavioural Modeling', 'MRI fysics', 'Cardiac MRI', 'MRI coils', 'Optical Network Design', 'Metrology', 'Signal Processing', 'Optics', 'Optical Sensors']",,,
